evals.prompt: Generate a Common Changelog release fragment for version 1.8.0 from these commits: feat(api): add /v2/report endpoint (#341), fix(ui): prevent crash on empty state (Fixes #338), chore(ci): update runner image.
evals.expected_output: Single release block with non-empty groups in Changed/Added/Removed/Fixed order, user-facing filtering, and references/author groups in canonical bullet shape.

evals.prompt: Normalize this entire CHANGELOG.md to Common Changelog format and keep release links consistent.
evals.expected_output: Complete file output that starts with '# Changelog', maintains valid release ordering, and keeps linked heading references consistent.

evals.prompt: Create an Unreleased section from these PR notes and do not invent release dates.
evals.expected_output: Unreleased heading appears first and is undated by default unless explicitly requested otherwise.

evals.prompt: Classify commits where trailer overrides type: fix(auth): rotate token parser plus footer Category: add.
evals.expected_output: Category trailer override is applied before type mapping, resulting in Added classification.

evals.prompt: Produce a release note entry for a breaking removal: feat!: remove legacy XML API, BREAKING CHANGE: clients must migrate to JSON API.
evals.expected_output: Entry is prefixed with '**Breaking:**' and still classified under the correct impact group.

evals.prompt: Generate release notes from metadata with missing commit authors and missing commit links.
evals.expected_output: Output keeps user-facing bullets, uses '(Unknown author)' and '(source unavailable)' fallbacks, and appends a Warnings section after the artifact.

evals.prompt: Given mixed technical commits, keep only user-facing changes and skip internal CI/test/style noise.
evals.expected_output: Non-user-facing items are omitted while user-visible behavior changes are retained and rewritten in imperative style.

evals.prompt: Normalize references so #123 and https://github.com/acme/repo/issues/123 are deduplicated.
evals.expected_output: Reference normalization and deduplication are applied with deterministic ordering rules.

evals.prompt: Generate one release fragment only for 2.0.0 from the provided commit list.
evals.expected_output: Exactly one release block is returned (plus optional trailing Warnings metadata only if needed).

evals.prompt: Normalize a changelog where release headings are linked but one trailing reference definition is missing.
evals.expected_output: Missing link definitions are repaired so every linked heading has exactly one trailing reference.
